# Design Documentation

This directory contains design documents and specifications.

## Protocol Design

- **PROTOCOL.md** - Protocol specification
- **SECURE_HANDSHAKE_EXPLAINED.md** - Secure handshake design

## Feature Design

- **COMPRESSION_DESIGN.md** - Compression algorithm design
- **SNAPSHOT_SYNC_DESIGN.md** - Snapshot synchronization design

---

These documents describe the design decisions and specifications for BlazeDB features.
